caption.p: Size‚Äêdependent vital rate regressions for (a) survival, (b) growth, (c) probability of reproducing, and (d) fecundity. Data from warmed individuals is shown with solid points, while data from individuals grown at ambient temperatures are shown with open points. Regression fits for warmed plants are shown with solid lines, and regression fits for ambient plants are shown with dotted lines. Leaf length was measured in cm.
